Banner.Description: I have extensive experience in AI model development, data analysis, and software engineering. As the founder of Nemo.AI, I use AI to drive innovation in sustainable fisheries. After 8 years of mastering beer pong, spritzing, and sangria-making, I’ve found that leadership and leading by example are key to pairing with solid team-working skills.
Banner.ActionBtn: Get a Spritz, ups in touch!
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my career, I’ve flitted through various roles as a Data Scientist across diverse industries. My special skill is dreaming up ideas—not always deeply considered, but undeniably brilliant at times. Take Nemo, for example. As founder and CEO, I’m still waiting for my first penny. Nemo aims to use artificial intelligence to boost the sustainability, efficiency, and profitability of fisheries. For more details, do visit nemoai.eu. Give me a problem, and I’ll tackle it with AI.
Some of the technologies I’ve worked with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Data Scientist
Description: I have a sneaking suspicion that next time I suggest implementing AI, my colleagues will hand me my marching orders. I'll keep you updated on my survival. Seriously though, I've mentioned AI here more than during my entire master's.

I even built a GPT-2 model from scratch—because who needs Hugging Face when you can struggle yourself? The model handles naming conventions for those who can't write bizarre codes. Check out at https://bird.ecb.europa.eu/.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Founder & CEO
Description: Alright, so here's the deal with Nemo. I don't poke fun at him because he's my baby. Yes, I may have written Founder & CEO on LinkedIn, but we're not even a Ltd. Yet. The idea is brilliant though. The project aims to revolutionise the Adriatic Sea fishing industry with AI-driven software.
I've been toiling away for a year without seeing a single penny. But if you're an investor, how about chucking a million my way? I'll pay you back, pinky promise. Kiss kiss!

Experience.Jobs.Title: Data Scientist
Description: Oh, this experience was a hoot! I dealt with bizarre folks who thought I was some kind of deity, but I was really just ChatGPT (haha). No, seriously, it was the most underpaid gig imaginable, but I felt like a proper finance bro. I picked up loads of useful skills I still use today.
And if anyone from Generali is reading this, just know that as soon as an investor throws some cash my way, I'm snatching up Mattia Vallicella for Team Nemo.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Logistics Automation Specialist
Description: Alright, moving to Belluno was the abroad experience that left the biggest mark on me. Yet again, I was an underpaid intern (is it just me, or is it Italy?). The work was actually pretty cool though—I was basically a project manager, but with an intern’s paycheck. I spent my days chatting with loads of people (clocking in 20K steps daily!).
The crowning glory of this experience? I met Del Vecchio. Now that's a proper flex!

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Nemo.AI
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: In 1970, 91% of marine resources were fished sustainably. In 2020, only 64% of the oceans were sustainable, with 35% overfished. Global fisheries are in crisis: shrinking fleets and fishermen demanding technology. Nemo.AI wants to help fishermen find Maximum Sustainable Yield (MSY), using artificial intelligence to predict the abundance and market value of fish. This not only optimizes fishing, but also protects marine ecosystems.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: FantaCreator
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Create, Play, Share. I cannot tell you more than that.

OtherProjects.Title: More about me

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: GPTGram
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: GPTGram is a project that combines the power of Generative Pretraining Transformers (GPT) with the versatility of Telegram's API to create a responsive and interactive chatbot.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: StockPy
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Deep Learning Regression and Classification Library built on top of PyTorch and Pyro

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: NBA-Playoff-prediction
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: The goal of this project is to predict the final outcome of the playoffs using the official statistics of all the games played by the NBA from January 2004 to March 2021.

Contact.Title: Let's have a beer!
Contact.Content: Or just send me money to buy a porsche. I'm open to both.
